SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="bcc51a49a5c24c928abf1e43f32e6cac" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You can all relax now![etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s back![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't
know how the Rescue Corps made it this
long without me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bcc51a49a5c24c928abf1e43f32e6cac" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Guess I'll find out soon enough,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] since the
captain's making me rest up a bit before I
get back into action.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="34d36006fcd24f528c722989daa461a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]OK, tenderfoot,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's see what you're
made of.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Eh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't give me that look.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You
can handle some extra-credit work.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="34d36006fcd24f528c722989daa461a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="CommandFaceOnly"/]Check out every inch of this planet until
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]you've explored each area 100%[System:Color name="Default"].
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="bcf42b0ec77947de8b1e887399ae4704" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Good rescue work requires thorough
investigation. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Show me you can explore
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]1 area[System:Color name="Default"] to 100 percent!
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="f91281921e2b4428b307ff8c301c5856" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]So you need my help,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eh, newbie?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I guess
I can lend a hand while I ramp back up.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f91281921e2b4428b307ff8c301c5856" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]But don't start thinking I'm going to do
everything for you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll only step in when
you really need it.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="a93d68d83d95488a8cb641add4f9c3e0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You know the comms guy, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He's
pretty handy to have around.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Very
detail oriented.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a93d68d83d95488a8cb641add4f9c3e0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]He's not one for physical labor,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but his
project-management skills are legit.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And
his eyes light up when he sees a machine.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="4c2d198e56294c3c9fd6e9237e83b6f4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I joined the corps before [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal02"/]Shepherd[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was
the captain.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] At the time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] she was still an
officer in training like me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4c2d198e56294c3c9fd6e9237e83b6f4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]I was undefeated in everything back home,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but then she absolutely crushed me at
martial arts and cross-country.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4c2d198e56294c3c9fd6e9237e83b6f4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The cool part was how modest she was
about it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She never tried to rub it in my
face.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'd never met anyone else like her...
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="5f655e61da37466ab73e7805a0ff97a7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]I don't mess around when I'm in a fight.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
When I move,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's at lightning speed.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Too
fast to track![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5f655e61da37466ab73e7805a0ff97a7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJobFaceOnly"/]I don't need anyone's help.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I don't want
anyone's directions.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yeah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's how you
handle things [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]-style!
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="7e34e6a5b88b4360bd8d05e349eaf5c9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Looks like you've been hard at work
investigating.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But you still have a lot
left to learn, recruit![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7e34e6a5b88b4360bd8d05e349eaf5c9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="CommandFaceOnly"/]Alright then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] no wasting time.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] On to the
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]second area[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I want you to impress me!
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="4c37fdeac1b84b50ad74debfdccb8818" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Situations that might seem impossible to
a newbie are a cakewalk to an experienced
ranger like me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4c37fdeac1b84b50ad74debfdccb8818" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]Like those [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Dandori Battles[System:Color name="Default"] and
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Dandori Challenges[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4c37fdeac1b84b50ad74debfdccb8818" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]If you get in over your head,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] give me a
shout.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll do what I can to help.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="530c920b456041d6b06f5eff84190e65" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]The Rescue Corps has many excellent
officers like the captain and me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but our
budget is barely enough.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="530c920b456041d6b06f5eff84190e65" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]You know why?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Because the captain loves
dogs.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The food bill for the pack of mutts
the corps maintains is just...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]ugh.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="b317948026da4b0f9ceca2d65149fd68" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You've probably met the science guy, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
The captain is always singing his praises.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
He's decent at what he does,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I guess.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b317948026da4b0f9ceca2d65149fd68" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]It's just...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]whenever he opens his mouth,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
a bunch of science gibberish spews
out.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Makes my head hurt.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="ac8eb06c0ffa4250a1e1f51c55c93613" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]There are some things I just can't do,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] not
even on the captain's orders.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ac8eb06c0ffa4250a1e1f51c55c93613" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="CommandFaceOnly"/]Like taking a mutt along on a rescue.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll
leave that up to you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]I just don't get the
whole dog thing.[System:Color name="Default"]
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="51e758371067450aa7a059a277005f67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]What?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You've fully investigated two
areas?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Huh...[System:Color name="Default"][etc:Wait frame="8"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]color me impressed.[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="51e758371067450aa7a059a277005f67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's still way too early to start
celebrating your accomplishments.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="51e758371067450aa7a059a277005f67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]There's a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]third area [System:Color name="Default"]to get started on.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Show me you can do it again!
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="9c30ed4b77e8457b97c64ec178540dd8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]It's far more efficient to split up during a
search.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You look like you might be
about to disagree.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Don't bother.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9c30ed4b77e8457b97c64ec178540dd8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Save your energy for the fights you need
to win,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] got it?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If you don't understand
that yet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you still have a lot to learn.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="f5b8a0a712ee464fa485546ea4b0438d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]When I was a kid,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there was this mountain
near our house.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I mustered up the courage
to climb it one day.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f5b8a0a712ee464fa485546ea4b0438d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ObieFaceOnly"/]The higher I climbed,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the more lost I got.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Then it started to snow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and suddenly it
was a life-or-death situation![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f5b8a0a712ee464fa485546ea4b0438d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGlad"/]The prior captain rescued me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I still recall
how cool he looked standing heroically
there in the snow.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f5b8a0a712ee464fa485546ea4b0438d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I knew right then that I was going to be a
ranger someday.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="8d70ecd2cddb4a32a9c3b3fd40d8efb7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The science guy's family runs a prominent
megacorporation on Giya.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I hear he joined
the Rescue Corps out of sheer curiosity.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8d70ecd2cddb4a32a9c3b3fd40d8efb7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]They throw a huge party for him every
time he comes back from a deployment.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Can you believe that?
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="b024d865391345b5b8dd62db4e99f6d8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The comms guy is a...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Whaddaya call it?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b024d865391345b5b8dd62db4e99f6d8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Oh yeah![etc:Wait frame="8"/] He's a jack-of-all-trades,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] master
of none.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b024d865391345b5b8dd62db4e99f6d8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]He's willing to take on anything you throw
his way.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Problem is,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] others tend to take
advantage of him.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b024d865391345b5b8dd62db4e99f6d8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitNoVoice"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]I suppose "others" includes me too,[System:Color name="Default"][etc:Wait frame="8"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ] heh.[System:Color name="Default"]
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="36895b57733f412b9ee9eb89f2a5a614" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Oho![etc:Wait frame="8"/] That look on your face says you
think you understand the basics better
than I do.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="36895b57733f412b9ee9eb89f2a5a614" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]If you get overconfident and start letting
your guard down now,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you'll find yourself
in a world of hurt before you know it![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="36895b57733f412b9ee9eb89f2a5a614" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Get it? [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Got it?! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Good.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] OK, newbie,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] go do
your thing!
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="51712fcdadef4973ae841469e4cf67c3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Have you met the science guy's mother?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I see you haven't...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let me tell you...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="51712fcdadef4973ae841469e4cf67c3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]She's notorious in the Rescue Corps for
being quite the character.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She'll be at the
commemoration party when we get home.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="51712fcdadef4973ae841469e4cf67c3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]You've nothing to fear,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so long as she
doesn't home in on you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just remember—
her eyes are drawn to movement.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="a1112b2a72b64b4c8757521034d90a1c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]gear[System:Color name="Default"] that the science guy makes
is definitely impressive...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]but always
too complicated![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Not the way I'd do it.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a1112b2a72b64b4c8757521034d90a1c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Instructions should be like,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "Do this,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] do
that,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and bam, boom, done!"[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Anything
longer, and everyone starts zoning out.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="c56104dedf2a479d8f5f85eb0b5a8648" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]When I joined the Rescue Corps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I trained
hard,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] sunup to sundown.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Every single day.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c56104dedf2a479d8f5f85eb0b5a8648" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]You though...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Must be nice to have it so
easy.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You got dropped into the action and
just started cranking out achievements.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="fd3cf47f86274d4794907fa6ccdeff88" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The captain is top-notch in pretty much
every way,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but there's just one thing...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fd3cf47f86274d4794907fa6ccdeff88" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]Why does she have to love those fuzzy
mongrels so much?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fd3cf47f86274d4794907fa6ccdeff88" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Every time she takes a break,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] she heads
out to the dog run with some Rescue Pups.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Every.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Single.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Time.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="039bf799fd544c39b1d65298a9a38d93" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]You really do have some skills.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]It's kind of
annoying.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They've investigated every area
to 100 percent so far.[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="039bf799fd544c39b1d65298a9a38d93" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="CommandFaceOnly"/]Of course, you haven't completed all your
missions yet.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's see if you can keep
that successful streak going!
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="bd240545bbd24d75804686fae6a9fe08" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Have you met the science guy's mother?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I see you haven't...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let me tell you...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bd240545bbd24d75804686fae6a9fe08" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]She's notorious in the Rescue Corps for
being quite the character.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She'll be at the
commemoration party when we get home.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bd240545bbd24d75804686fae6a9fe08" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]You've nothing to fear,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so long as she
doesn't home in on you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just remember—
her eyes are drawn to movement.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="448d8005035f4519aedc8db8e58d2e9b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The comms guy[System:Color name="NPC/Default" ] [System:Color name="Default"]spends all his free time
fiddling with machines.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He says it's the
mental equivalent of working out.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="448d8005035f4519aedc8db8e58d2e9b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Like how if you don't use your body,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it
gets weak.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Supposedly your brain works
the same way.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm not sure I buy it.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="0b76006fac7047be80e09186d0dc4964" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]That dog you go everywhere with seems
capable enough.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0b76006fac7047be80e09186d0dc4964" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]But I don't need any mutts running around![etc:Wait frame="8"/]
That's all I have to say about it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]It's not
that I'm afraid.[System:Color name="Default"][etc:Wait frame="8"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]I just don't trust 'em.[System:Color name="Default"]
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="5105d48fb2994ebf8280be4386810ad5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Once you've completely explored this
planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I guess I'll have to stop calling
you "newbie" and such,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] won't I, junior?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5105d48fb2994ebf8280be4386810ad5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="CommandFaceOnly"/]Ready for the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]sixth area[System:Color name="Default"]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's the last one.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You might just explore this whole planet
after all!
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="1712a1e364d945288fb8c6a52e91991d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'll admit,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you're doing some pretty fine
work out there.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Getting results one area
after another,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] aren't you?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1712a1e364d945288fb8c6a52e91991d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]But...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]whatever you do,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't forget I've
been here supporting you tirelessly this
whole time!
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="3063e39c4f1e4bd7a465b849cb8d6fef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If you think about it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the comms guy really
is our lifeline here.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3063e39c4f1e4bd7a465b849cb8d6fef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJobFaceOnly"/]Without his navigation,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] rescues would
take at least twice as long.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We literally
couldn't do this without him.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="f5c6bd031c7944a287f3007bbb72699a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You remember the reason I decided to be
a ranger?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Stranded on a snowy mountain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
rescued by the prior captain?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Ring a bell?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f5c6bd031c7944a287f3007bbb72699a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ObieFaceOnly"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I had collapsed.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] When I came to,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there
was this open mouth right in my face.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] All
sharp teeth and drool...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f5c6bd031c7944a287f3007bbb72699a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I ran like a wild thing,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] trying to escape,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but no matter how fast I went,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the beast
hounded me![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I couldn't get away![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f5c6bd031c7944a287f3007bbb72699a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]The captain finally brought the mutt to
heel,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so nothing bad happened,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but every
time I see a dog now,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I remember that day.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="b2f7a91923b34938b3578ac5f0266a3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]When I got stranded here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I thought I'd be
able to take care of myself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b2f7a91923b34938b3578ac5f0266a3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]But if something happened to the captain...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the Rescue Corps wouldn't be the
same without her.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="50cf3afa97e140588490f3658e165d08" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]What?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You're joking.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] No one could have
investigated all the areas that fast!
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="0d6cf25f12f94c99b8de92909c3d1239" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]You're like a full-fledged ranger now![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
[System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Maybe I can talk 'em into doing all the
work from now on...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]heh.[System:Color name="Default"]
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="752d5a83534045b0b133eae6078de39e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Oho![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You think you've got this under
control,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] is that it?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]No one can pull a
fast one on me, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]hmph.[System:Color name="Default"]
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="3467c2e04d0c4002bab7e95b9c879670" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I see...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you're not done yet, newbie.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Keep at it and finish the job!
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="f0fa87c657764bd89285dba3c8de9a1f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]OK, rookie,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's see what you're made of.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Eh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't give me that look.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You can handle
some extra-credit work.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f0fa87c657764bd89285dba3c8de9a1f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="CommandFaceOnly"/]Check out every inch of this planet until
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]you fully explore every area 100%[System:Color name="Default"]—[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f0fa87c657764bd89285dba3c8de9a1f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Wait.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] What are you trying to pull?[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
You can't have explored every area alre...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f0fa87c657764bd89285dba3c8de9a1f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Whoa![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You really are finished!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="9fb172bf32ec4113a73271cc0bda9f2a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] look at that...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now I know you're
someone I can put to good use.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearB0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="6d02e18a6be7437f82180c15130d96d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Oho![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You think you've got this under
control,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] is that it?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]No one can pull a
fast one on me, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]hmph.[System:Color name="Default"]

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="2e594f422449422081e99e93aa2361a5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I see...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you're not done yet, newbie.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Keep at it and finish the job!
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="bfa906f7ef7f4c3081743751dc9cdbee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you may be good,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but the best ranger
in this Rescue Corps will always be [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bfa906f7ef7f4c3081743751dc9cdbee" Scale="1"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Did I say that with enough confidence?[System:Color name="Default"][etc:Wait frame="15"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]
It'll be OK now.[System:Color name="Default"][etc:Wait frame="8"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]I'm still number one.[System:Color name="Default"]
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="c5f2c050d5f64cb8b48bad158616a4da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]You've improved substantially with my
guidance,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] which just proves how great I
really am.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c5f2c050d5f64cb8b48bad158616a4da" Scale="1"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]They investigated every area of a planet?[System:Color name="Default"][etc:Wait frame="8"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]
Even I haven't done that.[System:Color name="Default"]
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="a42d26716c52488fb25455fd2d2bb8b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You know the comms guy, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He's
pretty handy to have around.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Very
detail oriented.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a42d26716c52488fb25455fd2d2bb8b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]He's not one for physical labor,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but his
project-management skills are legit.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And
his eyes light up when he sees a machine.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="71d22919164544c88235b6a19f9c23f6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I joined the corps before [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal02"/]Shepherd[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was
the captain.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] At the time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] she was still an
officer in training like me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="71d22919164544c88235b6a19f9c23f6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]I was undefeated in everything back home,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but then she absolutely crushed me at
martial arts and cross-country.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="71d22919164544c88235b6a19f9c23f6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The cool part was how modest she was
about it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She never tried to rub it in my
face.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'd never met anyone else like her...
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="3c7105f972634ad3899d42e05bf0d0ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]I don't mess around when I'm in a fight.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
When I move,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's at lightning speed.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Too
fast to track![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3c7105f972634ad3899d42e05bf0d0ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJobFaceOnly"/]I don't need anyone's help.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I don't want
anyone's directions.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yeah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's how you
handle things [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]-style!
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="47211d13ef5b4550a06910d0537cc9ef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]The Rescue Corps has many excellent
officers like the captain and me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but our
budget is barely enough.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="47211d13ef5b4550a06910d0537cc9ef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]You know why?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Because the captain loves
dogs.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The food bill for the pack of mutts
the corps maintains is just...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]ugh.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="968fc848b60a443caa8b2d4c859eb54a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You've probably met the science guy, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
The captain is always singing his praises.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
He's decent at what he does,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I guess.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="968fc848b60a443caa8b2d4c859eb54a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]It's just...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]whenever he opens his mouth,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
a bunch of science gibberish spews
out.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Makes my head hurt.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="8c39214255da4a39b77440113c51871d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]There are some things I just can't do,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] not
even on the captain's orders.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8c39214255da4a39b77440113c51871d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="CommandFaceOnly"/]Like taking a mutt along on a rescue.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll
leave that up to you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]I just don't get the
whole dog thing.[System:Color name="Default"]
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="620d91ad37b247558a9b25c58422e475" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]When I was a kid,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there was this mountain
near our house.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I mustered up the courage
to climb it one day.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="620d91ad37b247558a9b25c58422e475" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ObieFaceOnly"/]The higher I climbed,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the more lost I got.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Then it started to snow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and suddenly it
was a life-or-death situation![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="620d91ad37b247558a9b25c58422e475" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGlad"/]The prior captain rescued me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I still recall
how cool he looked standing heroically
there in the snow.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="620d91ad37b247558a9b25c58422e475" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I knew right then that I was going to be a
ranger someday.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="0ad42d0d951246759f9f5db13b6aca61" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The science guy's family runs a prominent
megacorporation on Giya.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I hear he joined
the Rescue Corps out of sheer curiosity.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0ad42d0d951246759f9f5db13b6aca61" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]They throw a huge party for him every
time he comes back from a deployment.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Can you believe that?
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="47091122b1f7491eac02f2ab86bc4d67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The comms guy is a...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Whaddaya call it?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="47091122b1f7491eac02f2ab86bc4d67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Oh yeah![etc:Wait frame="8"/] He's a jack-of-all-trades,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] master
of none.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="47091122b1f7491eac02f2ab86bc4d67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]He's willing to take on anything you throw
his way.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Problem is,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] others tend to take
advantage of him.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="47091122b1f7491eac02f2ab86bc4d67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitNoVoice"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]I suppose "others" includes me too,[System:Color name="Default"][etc:Wait frame="8"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ] heh.[System:Color name="Default"]
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="8eb5cba9d96a4539bee5c2a5bf68e4fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]gear[System:Color name="Default"] that the science guy makes
is definitely impressive...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]but always
too complicated![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Not the way I'd do it.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8eb5cba9d96a4539bee5c2a5bf68e4fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Instructions should be like,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "Do this,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] do
that,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and bam, boom, done!"[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Anything
longer, and everyone starts zoning out.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_13:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="ee5a624584454c1da8569c334760c6af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]When I joined the Rescue Corps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I trained
hard,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] sunup to sundown.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Every single day.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ee5a624584454c1da8569c334760c6af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]You though...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Must be nice to have it so
easy.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You got dropped into the action and
just started cranking out achievements.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_14:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="421ff4b09b714870b792ead66493407e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The captain is top-notch in pretty much
every way,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but there's just one thing...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="421ff4b09b714870b792ead66493407e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]Why does she have to love those fuzzy
mongrels so much?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="421ff4b09b714870b792ead66493407e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Every time she takes a break,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] she heads
out to the dog run with some Rescue Pups.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Every.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Single.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Time.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_15:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="6ee90bad855b47e4b2934af0e02a8db4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The comms guy[System:Color name="NPC/Default" ] [System:Color name="Default"]spends all his free time
fiddling with machines.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He says it's the
mental equivalent of working out.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6ee90bad855b47e4b2934af0e02a8db4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Like how if you don't use your body,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it
gets weak.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Supposedly your brain works
the same way.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm not sure I buy it.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_16:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="c39d830012364e818e1edcebb71e8194" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]That dog you go everywhere with seems
capable enough.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c39d830012364e818e1edcebb71e8194" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]But I don't need any mutts running around![etc:Wait frame="8"/]
That's all I have to say about it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]It's not
that I'm afraid.[System:Color name="Default"][etc:Wait frame="8"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]I just don't trust 'em.[System:Color name="Default"]
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_17:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="2e9cc2d243044bffbbd0e2cf57f64a29" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If you think about it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the comms guy really
is our lifeline here.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2e9cc2d243044bffbbd0e2cf57f64a29" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJobFaceOnly"/]Without his navigation,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] rescues would
take at least twice as long.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We literally
couldn't do this without him.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_18:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="f287a3e68c744d04a7668fa1257a5f2f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You remember the reason I decided to be
a ranger?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Stranded on a snowy mountain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
rescued by the prior captain?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Ring a bell?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f287a3e68c744d04a7668fa1257a5f2f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ObieFaceOnly"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I had collapsed.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] When I came to,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there
was this open mouth right in my face.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] All
sharp teeth and drool...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f287a3e68c744d04a7668fa1257a5f2f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I ran like a wild thing,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] trying to escape,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but no matter how fast I went,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the beast
hounded me![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I couldn't get away![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f287a3e68c744d04a7668fa1257a5f2f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]The captain finally brought the mutt to
heel,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so nothing bad happened,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but every
time I see a dog now,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I remember that day.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_19:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="2c8c31926a0f45c18fdd86c6bf377758" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]When I got stranded here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I thought I'd be
able to take care of myself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2c8c31926a0f45c18fdd86c6bf377758" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]But if something happened to the captain...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the Rescue Corps wouldn't be the
same without her.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="a9f5c8eebbe04b9d881d9b07d0904208" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]You'd come here on your own to face me?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I applaud your courage, but...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a9f5c8eebbe04b9d881d9b07d0904208" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]Alright,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's enough.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I acknowledged you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Now shoo![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Get out of here!
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="fff55426b8e34708b69fa1512b637741" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Aaah![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Why are you running loose?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's
poor mutt management![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Ugh![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fff55426b8e34708b69fa1512b637741" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]What's that newbie doing?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Don't they
realize how irresponsible this is?!
